mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.serial AS serial,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus, A.type_id AS typeId,A.type_code AS typeCode,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy, A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.dict_code AS dictCode,A.user_id AS userId,A.name AS name, A.password AS password,A.last_login_time AS lastLoginTime,A.last_login_ip AS lastLoginIp,A.logo AS logo, A.province AS province,A.city AS city,A.address AS address,A.licence AS licence,A.licence_paths AS licencePaths, A.organization_code AS organizationCode,A.member_num AS memberNum,A.phone AS phone,A.phone2 AS phone2,A.is_warrant AS isWarrant,A.is_seven_return AS isSevenReturn,A.is_free_postage AS isFreePostage,A.credit_margin AS creditMargin, A.grade AS grade,A.score AS score,A.is_pc_upload_allowed AS isPcUploadAllowed,A.file_paths AS filePaths,A.file_paths2 AS filePaths2,A.link_type AS linkType,A.link_id AS linkId,A.owner_id AS ownerId,A.owner_ids AS ownerIds,A.attr_str AS attrStr, A.attr_str2 AS attrStr2,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.attr_int2 AS attrInt2,A.sequence AS sequence,A.remark AS remark,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy , A.coordinate AS coorDinate

,( SELECT count(*) FROM goods g WHERE A.id = g.shop_id AND g.deleted_at IS NULL AND (g.main_status IS NULL OR g.main_status = 1 OR g.main_status = 76) ) AS goodsNum ,u.username AS userName,u.is_real_auth AS isRealAuth,u.phone AS phone ,u.serial AS userSerial ,pca.area_name AS cityName,pca1.area_name AS provinceName

sql.if: AND (A.credit_margin IS NOT NULL OR u.is_real_auth = 2)

mapper.sql:
LEFT JOIN user u on A.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN user_relation ur ON ur.user_id = A.user_id AND ur.relation_type = 64
LEFT JOIN goods g ON g.shop_id = A.id AND (g.main_status IS NULL OR g.main_status = 1 OR g.main_status = 76)
LEFT JOIN province_city_area pca ON pca.id = A.city LEFT JOIN province_city_area pca1 ON pca1.id = A.province
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM
A LEFT JOIN user u on A.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN user_relation ur ON ur.user_id = A.user_id AND ur.relation_type = 64 where A.user_id = #{userId} AND A.deleted_at IS NULL LIMIT 0,1

SELECT
FROM
A
where u.serial = #{userSerial} AND A.deleted_at IS NULL LIMIT 0,1

SELECT
FROM
A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update:
